mapper.select:
SELECT pm.`code` AS 'key', pm.`text` AS VALUE,(SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) >= 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END FROM tb_partner_model_config c WHERE c.code = pm.code
AND c.userid =#{userid} ) checkeds FROM tb_dic_print_model pm WHERE 1=1
AND pm.type=#{type}
GROUP BY pm.code
select key1 as 'key' ,value from tb_dic_values where keycode='000000004' order by key1
select key1 as 'key' ,value from tb_dic_values where keycode='call' order by sort
select key1 as 'key' ,value from tb_dic_values where keycode='custody_call' order by sort
select key1 as 'key' ,value from tb_dic_values where keycode='unit_type' order by sort
select key1 as 'key' ,value from tb_dic_values where keycode='case_type' order by sort
select key1 as 'key' ,value from tb_dic_values where keycode='fee_type' order by sort

select count(1) from tb_upc_dic_values t,tb_upc_dic_keys k WHERE 1=1 AND t.keycode=k.keycode
and (t.keyvalue like '%${search}%' or t.keycode = #{search})
SELECT username AS VALUE,usercode AS 'key' FROM tb_upc_users WHERE usercode!='admin' AND delstatus IS NULL
select key1 as 'key' ,value from tb_dic_values where keycode='000000002' order by key1
SELECT v.`keyid`, v.`keyvalue` FROM `tb_upc_dic_values` v WHERE v.`keycode` = 'feetype' ORDER BY v.`sort`

SELECT a.`area_id` as 'key', CONCAT(u.`username`, '-', i.`areaname`) AS value FROM `tb_upc_area` a LEFT JOIN `tb_upc_users` u ON a.`userid` = u.`userid` LEFT JOIN `tb_upc_area_info` i ON i.`areacode` = a.`areacode` LEFT JOIN tb_judicial_feetype ft ON ft.`area_id`=a.`area_id` WHERE a.`is_delete` = 0
AND u.initials like '%${query}%' AND (ft.`type_id` IS NULL OR ft.`is_delete`=1)
AND a.area_id = #{area_id}
AND u.`username` IS NOT NULL AND i.`areaname` IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY u.username
limit 1
